title: So. how long does it take for you to answer a ticket? :p
body: It's taken 12 hours now and no sign of any help, how long does it normally take for rito to answer a ticket?

replies.body:
Sometimes our agents can get a little overwhelmed depending on just how many tickets are coming in at that time. We did recently have a few server issues, so that might very well be slowing down the response time a little. 

I went ahead and pulled up your ticket and it looks like an agent responded and you should have gotten an email notification! Be sure to double check for their reply ^_^!
I saw it now! :) It was in the "junk" mail for some reason. Thanks for the response :)
